wordGroup: apple cider 苹果酒，苹果汁；苹果醋

sentences.en: Nutmeg, parsley and cider all complement the flavour of these beans well.
sentences.cn: 肉豆蔻、欧芹和苹果酒都凸显这些菜豆的味道。

sentences.en: Place the saucepan over moderate heat until the cider is very hot but not boiling.
sentences.cn: 将炖锅置于中火上，直到把苹果酒煮热，但不要煮沸。

sentences.en: I generally like beer, but I'll go for cider sometimes.
sentences.cn: 我通常喜欢啤酒，但是我有时候喝苹果酒。
